snippet: Steven Erlanger reports that the right in France faces its most painful dilemma in a generation: align with the extremist National Front or risk electoral extinction in parliamentary elections in June. Nearly three-quarters of right-wing voters want...
abstract: Steven Erlanger reports that the right in France faces its most painful dilemma in a generation: align with the extremist National Front or risk electoral extinction in parliamentary elections in June. Nearly three-quarters of right-wing voters want an alliance. Read more »
